item.title: IRoblian
item.description: Wasd Programmer. I believe The best teams make the best games and Roblox is the future of gaming.

item.title: Hobi
item.description: At Wasd Games, I’m responsible for art direction, asset management, and marketing, and I’m very interested in the touchpoints that connect users to developers.

item.title: holymsg
item.description: I am a Wasder. I have no money.

item.title: STEEE2L
item.description: Game Design at Wasd Games. With the mission of Simple is Best, I’m working hard to make it easy and fun to play, even if it’s not super hard.

item.title: Zara
item.description: I’m a software engineer who can work on both AI and games. He’s the third member of the Wasd Games and fell in love with Roblox at some point.

item.title: Hammer Wars
item.description: Hammer Wars is the first publicly available game from Wasd Games. It is a core game that takes the concept of kill and turns it into blow.

item.title: About
item.description: A small game development team that makes a best game that plays for Next-Generation Wasd Games starts with the slogan, “The best teams make the best games.
